line_2: That stole, a while, her heart awa' .
When click! the string the snick did draw;
And jee! the door gaed to the wa';
And by my ingle-lowe I saw,

line_1: He greeted the carline and lasses sae braw,
line_2: On bonny sweet Nanny the youngest of a'.

line_1: She gangs sae light headed and buskit sae braw,
line_2: To fairs and to bridals and preachings and a',

line_1: Heav'n mak you guid as weel as braw,
